EmailTemplate.name: Channel Partner E-Blast.May Newsletter.May Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: May 2016 Honeywell Channel Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://aerospace.honeywell.com]]> Facebook <[[www.Facebook.com/HoneywellAerospace]]> LinkedIn <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace?trk=company_logo]]> Twitter <[[www.Twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero]]> YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoEXFVPJYdvlmwyp3Sz8QRw]]> In the May issue of Honeywell's Channel Newsletter, we introduce our newest resource to you - the Channel Partner Services webpage, the Primus II Radio Upgrade and its effect on the ADS-B Out 2020 deadline, three reasons your customers must upgrade their data loaders to the DL-950 before the end of 2016 and three trends all business aviation operators should follow in 2016.
Honeywell's Channel Partner Services We’ve created a dedicated webpage for our channel partners so that they can access articles related to their business; download helpful material about Honeywell’s solutions; and connect with the Honeywell channel marketing team to get customized co-branded marketing solutions - it's that simple.
Visit the page <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/service-listing/channel-partner-services/?utm_campaign=channel-newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter]]>
The Primus II Upgrade: An All-in-One Solution for the ADS-B Out 2020 Mandate As we start to near 2020, many operators are struggling to find a solution that fits their current aircraft configuration. For many, the answer is simple: The Primus II Radio.
Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/news-listing/2016/april/the-primus-ii-upgrade-an-all-in-one-solution-for-the-ads-b-out-2020-mandate/?utm_campaign=channel-newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter]]>
Three Reasons to Upgrade to the DL-950 If you know one of the 400 operators still using the DL-900, there's a few reasons why they should upgrade before the end of 2016.
Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/news-listing/2016/march/three-reasons-to-upgrade-to-the-dl-950/?utm_campaign=channel-newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter]]>
Three Trends Business Aviation Operators Should Follow in 2016
In 2016, business aviation operators should be following these three trends that are guaranteed to improve their productivity and simplify their upgrade path.
Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/blogs/2016/may/three-trends-business-aviation-operators-should-follow-in-2016/?utm_campaign=channel-newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter]]>
In Other News...
Honeywell's APU and Engine Inventory
We would like to share a great opportunity to acquire equipment from our Engine and APU inventory. For additional information on a specific solution, please contact: Chuck Oberfield <[[charles.n.oberfield2honeywell.com]]> APUs 602.365.2034
Cory Little <[[mailto:cory.little@honeywell.com]]> Propulsion 602.231.2324
Christ Jordan <[[mailto:christopher.jordan@honeywell.com]]> Propulsion 602.365.5549
Q1 Shared STCs
Honeywell's Sales Advisory Board
On April 21, the Honeywell Sales Advisory Board met about several key topics including the MyAerospace Portal, pricing and ways to improve our overall efforts moving forward. The board plans to meet again in June to regroup and discuss more of these topics. If you're an SAB member and still haven't taken the survey, please take a moment to do so here <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/7238C9D]]>.
Please do not forward this email as its survey link is unique to you.
